name: Fear of the dark (itch) (mymy3, MrSinga, doyouknownina, Mellopi, Koelekikkers.nl)
name_original: Fear of the dark (itch) (mymy3, MrSinga, doyouknownina, Mellopi, Koelekikkers.nl)
description:
FEAR OF THE DARK

This is a school project.

This experience is about fear of the dark.  It's about a teddy bear that needs to find his child in the dark.
